sqlMap.select:
select IFNULL(sum(b.TRAN_AMT), 0.00) AS money from bps_rw_history a LEFT JOIN
mdx_epp b ON a.dr_key =b.dr_key where a.yw_type='EPP'
mdx_zdfq b ON a.dr_key =b.dr_key where a.yw_type='账单分期'
and a.user_name = #userName# AND a.callid!='' AND a.rw_ctime >#beginTime# AND a.rw_ctime <=#endTime#;

select IFNULL(sum(b.YSED), 0.00) AS money from bps_rw_history a LEFT JOIN
mdx_deczj b ON a.dr_key = b.dr_key where a.yw_type='大额EPPC'
mdx_eppc b ON a.dr_key = b.dr_key where a.yw_type='EPPC' and b.Data_type!='新发卡备用金'
mdx_eppc b ON a.dr_key = b.dr_key where a.yw_type='EPPC' and b.Data_type='新发卡备用金'
AND b.md_source ='get' and a.user_name = #userName# AND a.callid!='' AND a.rw_ctime >#beginTime# AND a.rw_ctime <=#endTime#;

select IFNULL(sum(b.PHJE), 0.00) AS money from bps_rw_history a LEFT JOIN
mdx_deczj b ON a.dr_key = b.dr_key where a.yw_type='大额EPPC'
mdx_eppc b ON a.dr_key = b.dr_key where a.yw_type='EPPC' and b.Data_type!='新发卡备用金'
mdx_eppc b ON a.dr_key = b.dr_key where a.yw_type='EPPC' and b.Data_type='新发卡备用金'
AND b.md_source in('S','T','U') and a.user_name = #userName# AND a.callid!='' AND a.rw_ctime >#beginTime# AND a.rw_ctime <=#endTime#;

select COUNT(DISTINCT a.md_id) AS A from
bps_gdx_epp a
bps_gdx_zdfq a
bps_gdx_eppc a
bps_gdx_deczj a
where mainyw='EPP'
where mainyw='账单分期'
where mainyw='大额EPPC'
where mainyw='EPPC' AND pettycash!='新发卡备用金'
where mainyw='EPPC' AND pettycash='新发卡备用金'
left join md_success b on a.md_id = b.md_id where a.mainyw='EPPC' and b.pettycash != '新发卡备用金'
left join md_success b on a.md_id = b.md_id where a.mainyw='EPPC' and b.pettycash = '新发卡备用金'
and gdx_exzx=#userName# AND str_to_date(gdx_extime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >=#beginTime# AND str_to_date(gdx_extime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer !=1;

select COUNT(DISTINCT a.md_id) AS B from
bps_gdx_epp a
bps_gdx_zdfq a
bps_gdx_eppc a
bps_gdx_deczj a
where mainyw='EPP'
where mainyw='账单分期'
where mainyw='大额EPPC'
where mainyw='EPPC' AND pettycash!='新发卡备用金'
where mainyw='EPPC' AND pettycash='新发卡备用金'
left join md_success b on a.md_id = b.md_id where a.mainyw='EPPC' and b.pettycash != '新发卡备用金'
left join md_success b on a.md_id = b.md_id where a.mainyw='EPPC' and b.pettycash = '新发卡备用金'
and gdx_exzx=#userName# AND Update_t >=#beginTime# AND Update_t <= #endTime# AND forceTransfer =1 AND approve_rst = '成功' and status_Approved = '已批核';
